trans-unit.source: Represents a static text item on a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et statisk tekstelement på et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionTextItem class represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionTextItem representerer individuelle statisk tekstelementer i et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: Individual items are associated together to form a panel by returning the group from a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Enkeltelementer er knyttet til sammen for å danne et panel ved å returnere gruppen fra et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most commonly, a static text item is used to create an informative label in a panel.
trans-unit.target: En statisk tekst-elementet er brukes vanligvis til å opprette en informativ etikett i et panel.

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a static text item causes no action.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker på et statisk tekst-element gjør noe.

trans-unit.source: The derived type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> is typically used to create labels to separate categories.
trans-unit.target: Den utledede typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem>brukes vanligvis til å opprette etiketter for å skille kategorier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionTextItem constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property to `null`.
For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan `category` parameteren brukes til å gruppere elementer på et panel, kan du se den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The panel text for this item.
The category used to group similar items on the panel.
trans-unit.target: Kategorien som skal brukes til et element på panelet.
